name: Boundog
description:
Cooperate with your not-so-smart dog to get rid of the rats!

Dogbound is all about friendship, hunger and connections. Your property has been invaded by a very big swarm of RATS! Although they’re kinda cute, you have to get rid of them. Make your dog follow you and eat some rats in the process!

Submitted for the GMTK Jam 2021

CONTROLS: WASD

IN GAME:

Developed by Xibalboys:

  • Andreu Benedi - Programming and illumination
  • Isaac “ISI” López - IU/UX design, 3D modelling and textures
  • Alejandro Núñez - Programming
  • Sergio “Coexito” Sánchez - Programming
  • Llibert Sans - 3D modelling, animations, particles and sound desing
  • Alejandro “Bobueno” Trinidad - 3D modelling and textures
  • Felisa “GhoulMage” Aguiar - Music production
